LanguageData.INSDoorSimple_Polymer.label: Insulated Door (Polymer)
LanguageData.INSDoorSimple_Polymer.description: An insulated door that divides rooms. Simple doors must be manually opened, which slows people down. The amount of slowdown depends on what the door is made of.
LanguageData.INSDoor_Polymer.label: Insulated Autodoor (Polymer)
LanguageData.INSDoor_Polymer.description: An insulated door that divides rooms. Powered operation allows people to move through the door without slowing down.
